case.name: Commissioner of Taxation v Miniello [2008] FCA 397 (11 March 2008)

citphrases.citphrase: s 224 and s 226l of income tax assessment act 1936 (cth)
whether "purpose" for which a scheme is entered into or carried out is to be assessed by reference to the subjective purpose of the parties to the scheme
derived from treating income tax law as applying in relation to a tax avoidance scheme
whether entered into or carried out for the sole or dominant purpose of enabling a person to pay no or less tax
